channel.title: Potential Explotation (nvm Just Glitch)
channel.description:
Update: Seems to be a visual error. My game crashed and when I reconnected it seemed to reset all my charges. Used a charge and then next night went back to the original number remaining.
Don't want to disclose it but think I found a way to reset abilities in game. Please private message me for more info.
